courses.title: Personal Finance for Beginners
courses.description: Learn the core principles of money management, budgeting, and saving tailored for Indian households.

courses.title: Stock Market Investing
courses.description: A practical guide to investing in Indian equities, with hands-on learning and market analysis.

courses.title: Taxation for Individuals
courses.description: Understand income tax laws, deductions, and filing procedures for salaried and self-employed individuals.

courses.title: Advanced Financial Planning
courses.description: Master financial goal setting, risk analysis, retirement planning, and portfolio optimization.

testimonials.quote: Excellent platform for learning real-world finance—it's like having a mentor on call.

blogs.title: Top 5 Budgeting Mistakes to Avoid
blogs.excerpt: Many people unknowingly make these budgeting errors...
blogs.content: Budgeting is essential but only works if executed correctly. Avoid impulse purchases, overestimating income, and forgetting variable expenses.
blogs.author: CA Rachana Ranade

blogs.title: Understanding SIP: A Beginner’s Guide
blogs.excerpt: SIP or Systematic Investment Plan is a powerful tool...
blogs.content: SIPs allow individuals to invest small amounts regularly in mutual funds, building discipline and wealth over time.
blogs.author: CA Rachana Ranade

blogs.title: Income Tax Filing Myths Busted
blogs.excerpt: Think you don't need to file because you're a student?
blogs.content: Income tax filing can apply to multiple scenarios. Know when and why filing is important—even if income is below threshold.
blogs.author: Team FinanceWithRR

blogs.title: Retirement Planning in Your 30s
blogs.excerpt: Start early, retire stress-free. Here's how.
blogs.content: Planning in your 30s means compounding works in your favor. Understand long-term goals and smart fund allocation.
blogs.author: Guest Contributor

calculators.name: SIP Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate your future wealth based on monthly SIP investments.

calculators.name: Loan EMI Calculator
calculators.description: Estimate your monthly EMI and total interest payout for any loan.

calculators.name: Retirement Corpus Calculator
calculators.description: Plan your retirement by calculating the corpus needed based on your current age and lifestyle.

calculators.name: Goal-Based Investment Calculator
calculators.description: Align your investments with specific financial goals such as education or travel.

faqs.question: Do I need any prior knowledge to enroll in a course?
faqs.answer: No prior knowledge is required for beginner-level courses. Intermediate and advanced levels may require basic financial literacy.

faqs.question: Can I access the courses on mobile?
faqs.answer: Yes, our platform is fully responsive and mobile-friendly for learning on the go.

faqs.question: Is there a refund policy?
faqs.answer: Refunds are available within 7 days of purchase, subject to terms and conditions.

faqs.question: Are the calculators free to use?
faqs.answer: Basic calculators are available for free. Advanced tools require a Standard or Premium membership.

faqs.question: Who creates the course content?
faqs.answer: All course content is curated and reviewed by CA Rachana Ranade and a team of certified financial experts.
